data.quote: A hero's job is to risk his life to turn his promises into reality
data.author: Izuku Midoriya

data.quote: I destroy my enemies when i make them my friends.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: I just keep moving forward, until all of my enemies are destroyed.
data.author: Eren Jaeger

data.quote: There is no way to happiness. Happiness is the way.
data.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

data.quote: Knowing what it feels to be in pain, is exactly why we try to be kind to others.
data.author: Jiraiya

data.quote: It is a great thing to start life with a small number of really good books which are your very own.
data.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

data.quote: The circumstances of oneâ€™s birth are irrelevant, but it is what you do with the gift of life that determines who you are
data.author: MewTwo

data.quote: Human beings are strong because we can change ourselves.
data.author: Saitama

data.quote: The world isn't perfect. But it's there for us, doing the best it can....that's what makes it so damn beautiful.
data.author: Roy Mustang
